title: [Large-Scale] Fundamentals of Mathematical Modeling for Predicting Molecular Subtypes of Bladder Cancer

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, matrix operations, and machine learning concepts understanding
context.additional_context: For job seekers interested in medical data analysis, learning to solve biological classification problems through mathematical approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical methods for extracting features from medical image data.
Learners can calculate metrics (accuracy, AUC, etc.) for evaluating classification model performance.
Learners can design simplified deep learning model architectures executable in resource-constrained computing environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
